title: Graduate Architectural Design Project
description: Comprehensive building design and research project in an architectural concentration area. Demonstration of professional competency in integration of architectural theory, principles and practice with creative, organizational and technical abilities in architectural programming, design and design research. Total credit limited to 15 units. 5 laboratories.
prerequisites: ARCH 407, ARCH 451, ARCH 452, ARCH 453 and 5th-year standing
